# textutils.remove_punctuation { #textutils.textutils.remove_punctuation }

```python
textutils.remove_punctuation(text)
```

Remove all punctuation from the given text.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                | Default    |
|--------|--------|--------------------------------------------|------------|
| text   | str    | The text from which to remove punctuation. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                            |
|--------|--------|----------------------------------------|
|        | str    | The text with all punctuation removed. |

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type      | Description                        |
|--------|-----------|------------------------------------|
|        | TypeError | If the input text is not a string. |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> remove_punctuation('Hello, World!')
'Hello World'
>>> remove_punctuation('What?! No way...')
'What No way'
>>> remove_punctuation('')
''
>>> remove_punctuation('Numbers 123 are fine!')
'Numbers 123 are fine'
>>> remove_punctuation('Emojis ğŸ˜€ stay too!')
'Emojis ğŸ˜€ stay too'
```
